txt.en: Your tireless work against the goblins has been a great help to the dwarves of Moria, but it is oft said that where one falls, two will come forth to take its place. Goblins should be destroyed whenever they are encountered, for they are evil to the very core and spread evil wherever they go.

The spears of Moria's goblins are sharp and unlooked-for in the dark, and their eyes see farther than most, piercing the gloom with their cunning glares. The goblins of Khazad-d√ªm are gifted with many advantages in that darkened place.
